message.name: ERR_PRODUCTPROVIDER_RNFE
message.locale: An active product provider could not be found for the product %1s.

message.name: ERR_MULTIPLEPRODUCTPROVIDERS
message.locale: There can only be one active product provider for the product %1s.

message.name: INF_AUTOCASECREATED
message.locale: A %1s case %2s has automatically been created in respect of %3s case %4s for %5s - %6n.

message.name: INF_AUTOCASECREATED_DETAILS
message.locale: A %1s case has automatically been created with case reference %2s for %3s - %4s. This was due to the reassessment of %5s case %6s. The %1s amount was %7s.
